title: The networked beauty of forests - Suzanne Simard

multiple-choice.question: What is the relationship between the forest and its organisms, according to the speaker?

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: They are a type of insect that pollinates plants.

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: It causes a significant increase in greenhouse gas emissions and can lead to the collapse of the forest ecosystem.

options.label: D

options.text: By clear-cutting more trees.

options.label: B
options.text: By reducing our carbon footprint and using renewable energy sources.

options.label: C
options.text: By not spending time in forests and not learning about how they work.

options.label: D
options.text: By not protecting forests and letting them collapse.
